title: Demolitionist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Destroy a house at night or hide in the rubble.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever you kill someone, their house will become rubble. The next night, nobody can pass the destroyed house (it is assumed all players are in a line, going from 1 to the last player. If house 5 is destroyed, then player 4 cannot visit player 6.)
- The rubble is cleaned up after 1 day.
- Whenever there is rubble, you can hide in the rubble, giving you Powerful defense for the night, and giving you favorable results for all Investigative abilities.
- The first time you are executed, you do not die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 647
*"No, you can't blow up houses to win in Hide & Seek, that's against the rules."*
